case-study-dish-network.title: Case Study: Dish Network
case-study-dish-network.excerpt: Truffle, though its Truffle University program, taught engineers at DISH how to build blockchain applications.

case-study-microsoft-xbox.title: Case Study: Microsoft Xbox
case-study-microsoft-xbox.ingredients: Azure Blockchain Service, Truffle Suite, Quorum Blockchain
case-study-microsoft-xbox.excerpt: Microsoft and EY partnered to develop royalty payment system for Xbox using Truffle and the Quorum blockchain.

case-study-starbucks.title: Case Study: Starbucks
case-study-starbucks.ingredients: Truffle Suite, Ethereum Blockchain, Jenkins, Infura, Kubernetes, Azure, Fortify
case-study-starbucks.excerpt: Starbucks wanted to provide their customers with more transparency while creating financial opportunities for their coffee bean farmers.

case-study-microsoft-and-the-world-bank.title: Case Study: Microsoft & The World Bank
case-study-microsoft-and-the-world-bank.excerpt: The World Bank and the Commonwealth Bank of Australia agreed to create a platform to launch the first bond that was created, allocated, transferred and managed using distributed ledger technology.
